text: Pepsi Next is a discontinued cola-flavored carbonated soft drink. It was produced by PepsiCo. It was a variant of the Pepsi cola range. It was sweetened with high fructose corn syrup, sugar, acesulfame potassium, and sucralose. It was marketed toward drinkers of full-calorie Pepsi, and those who do not enjoy the taste of Diet Pepsi, Pepsi ONE, Pepsi Max, and other diet colas. Category:Soft drinks
title: Pepsi Next
